original_text: Therefore, the anger of the Lord has fallen on Judah and Jerusalem; he has made them an object of dread and horror and scorn, as you can see with your own eyes.
korean_text: 여호와께서 유다와 예루살렘에 진노하시고 내버리사 두려움과 놀람과 비웃음거리가 되게 하신 것을 너희가 똑똑히 보는 바라

sentences.original_text: Therefore, the anger of the Lord has fallen on Judah
he has made them an object of dread
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 무서워하는 대상이 되게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: as you can see with your own eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 눈으로 보는 바와 같이
